BlogPost.title: BlogPost
BlogPost.description: Represents a blog post published by Simon Styles Limited, featuring rich content and media to create a beautiful and stunning showcase.

id.description: Unique identifier for the BlogPost entity.

title.description: The main title of the blog post.

slug.description: A URL-friendly, unique slug for the blog post, used in its public URL.

summary.description: A brief summary or excerpt of the blog post content, ideal for previews.

content.description: The full body content of the blog post, supporting rich text or HTML for a visually appealing presentation.

featuredImageUrl.description: URL to the primary image or banner associated with the blog post for visual appeal.

publishDate.description: The date and time when the blog post was officially published.

authorName.description: The name of the author of the blog post, typically 'Simon Styles' for this portfolio.

tags.description: A list of tags or categories that describe the blog post's content.

viewCount.description: The total number of times the blog post has been viewed.

likeCount.description: The aggregate count of likes received by this blog post.

commentCount.description: The aggregate count of comments on this blog post.

Comment.title: Comment
Comment.description: Represents a user-submitted comment on a blog post or a reply to another comment, allowing anonymous interaction.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Comment entity.

blogPostId.description: Reference to the BlogPost this comment belongs to.

parentId.description: Optional reference to a parent Comment if this comment is a reply.

authorName.description: The name provided by the commenter.

authorEmail.description: Optional email address of the commenter.

content.description: The text content of the comment.

commentDate.description: The date and time when the comment was posted.

isApproved.description: Indicates whether the comment has been approved for public display.

likeCount.description: The aggregate count of likes received by this comment.

Like.title: Like
Like.description: Records a 'like' action performed by a user on a blog post or a comment, supporting anonymous interactions.

id.description: Unique identifier for the Like entity.

targetId.description: The ID of the entity (BlogPost or Comment) that was liked.

targetType.description: The type of entity that was liked (e.g., 'BlogPost', 'Comment').

anonymousLikerIdentifier.description: A identifier for the user to prevent duplicates.

likeDate.description: The date and time when the like was recorded.

/blogPosts/{blogPostId}/comments/{commen.description: Comments on blog posts, supporting replies via parentId.
